title: How many files scanned
body:
Hey,
My client crashed while updating now it is sat on 33% and has 1.6k files scanned. how many does it go up too? or should i restart it again?

replies.body: Yeeaa i've used repair and it scanned 862 files and then just stopped.. the client didn't pause but the scanning stopped and have been been waiting for soooo long for it to start the patch -_-

You can go on youtube and search it up you will have to go to your lol files and delete a group of files then you will restart and it will work or you can go to the quistion mark in the top right and click repair
Same. Stuck at 33% and it gives me an error.

Scanning Files is actually a very normal part of the patching process.  When faced with an update, the patcher scans the installation looking for any corrupted or missing files that need to be replaced.  The best step to take is to simply let it scan as many files as it needs to.  As long as you don't get an error message, the patcher should patch normally.

If you do get an error specifically when scanning files, it may indicate a problem with your OS Permissions.  Your OS might simply be blocking the patcher from scanning as many files as it needs to.  In this case, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  

Let me know if you have any further questions!

Currently experiencing the same thing. My client went up to 24k files scanned before an error occurred and it had to RESTART scanning.

Please anyone shed some light on this?
